page2.title: Research
page2.content: Explanation-based Weakly-supervised Learning of Visual Relations with Graph Networks . Federico Baldassarre, Kevin Smith, Josephine Sullivan, Hossein Azizpour A novel weakly-supervised method for visual relationship detection that relies on minimal image-level predicate labels, graph networks, and attribution-based explanations. Conference paper at ECCV 2020 . | GraphQA: Protein Model Quality Assessment using Graph Convolutional Network .
